texto: Marce is a beautiful soul and loving teacher. I am still learning Spanish, but was still able to get a great experience from her classes. I highly recommend checking out her kundalini yoga class if you are staying in Medellin. What a blessing she is!.

Fue una experiencia hermosa. Quer√≠a que mi esposo tuviera un cumplea√±os de ir hacia adentro (A diferencia de lo habitual, que se acostumbra a celebrar m√°s hacia afuera, hacia compartir con los dem√°s, etc), de agradecer ese a√±o transcurrido y la persona que fue y que deja atr√°s, de estar totalmente abierto a recibir los regalos de este nuevo ciclo, tener un ritual donde pudiera conectar profundamente consigo. Me encant√≥ el ritual, no ten√≠a mucha idea de qu√© trataba en s√≠, pero fue absolutamente hermoso para los dos. Y agradec√≠ mucho que se pudiera hacer en nuestra casa. Gracias, gracias, gracias.

El centro de bienestar es un lugar seguro, con muy buena energ√≠a, y la facilitadora Marcela hace honor a su t√≠tulo: una maestra de la sabidur√≠a que te gu√≠a y te ense√±a con diferentes talleres y experiencias a conectarte contigo y con tus memorias, para aceptar, agradecer, crecer y recibir con amor.

- Marcela is beyond gifted. She is one of these teachers that knows her eternal value, and can therefore remind you of yours. - She does an excellent job of explaining each part of the yoga, and how each movement and point of focus (the breath, balance, etc.) are necessary for the final poses and feelings of bliss. - Her ability to pair music to the session, and use singing bowls for healing, was otherworldly. - I was in disbelief at how much emotion she brought us out and help us to hold. ‚ÅÉ Everyone on our trip deeply felt that they needed this time to physically, mentally and spiritually recover. ‚ÅÉ Her friend took videos which they distributed to us for free so we could remember the experience. ‚ÅÉ Finally, they finished the session with complimentary cake, tortilla chips and guacamole at the end for my birthday. I felt incredibly well loved by the experience. Marcela is a gift to us all, I would recommend her to anyone

Espectacular! Marcela es una profesora bellisima con un regalo especial. La pasamos increible en mi despedida dias antes de mi boda. Ame la clase de yoga y sound healing que nos dio. Super recomendada para eventos especiales y para regalar a alguien que amas.

The instructor was very friendly and welcoming, and I enjoyed the class. The yoga studio is in a beautiful place. I highly recommend this class!.
